messages.title: Fighting for their future
messages.content: Liberal Democrats plan to revolutionise education for children across Britain. Fresh start for kids primary schools will be given extra funding to cut class sizes to 15 for the youngest children.

messages.title: We need REAL change
messages.content: Nick Clegg says only the Liberal Democrats offer real change, the Conservatives and Labor are just more of the same.

messages.title: Fair pay for heroes
messages.content: Massive response to Lib Dem campaign for a fair deal for our troops.

messages.title: Who will put more money in YOUR pocket?
messages.content: The Lib Dems have announced a plan to cut the tax bills of people across the UK, putting £700 back into the pocket of every tax payer.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Introduce smaller class sizes and increase funding for education, specifically targeting the youngest children with a cap of 15 students per class.
A £700 tax cut to ensure fairer distribution and to give back to each tax payer.
Argue for fair treatment and pay for British troops.

mentions.candidate: Nick Clegg wants to build a better future for our children
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Gordon Brown has let people down...; What sort of 'change' do the Conservatives offer?

issues.economy: Tax cut for middle income families; Pay more, get less with Gordon Brown; Abolished the 10p tax rate; Bailed out the banks, not families; Raising bills, taxes and recession
issues.education: Liberal Democrats plan to revolutionise education; Fresh start for kids; Class sizes to 15 for the youngest children

politicalExperience.achievements: Campaign for fair treatment and pay for British troops

images.caption: Nick Clegg with children holding a pledge for better education.
